metadata.title: CVE-2022-21541 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Vulnerability in the Oracle Java SE, Oracle GraalVM Enterprise Editionproduct of Oracle Java SE (component: Hotspot). Supported versions that areaffected are Oracle Java SE: 7u343, 8u333, 11.0.15.1, 17.0.3.1, 18.0.1.1;Oracle GraalVM Enterprise Edition: 20.3.6, 21.3.2 and 22.1.0. Difficult toexploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network accessvia multiple protocols to compromise Oracle Java SE, Oracle GraalVMEnterprise Edition. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result inunauthorized creation, deletion or modification access to critical data orall Oracle Java SE, Oracle GraalVM Enterprise Edition accessible data.Note: This vulnerability applies to Java deployments, typically in clientsrunning sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets,that load and run untrusted code (e.g., code that comes from the internet)and rely on the Java sandbox for security. This vulnerability can also beexploited by using APIs in the specified Component, e.g., through a webservice which supplies data to the APIs. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 5.9 (Integrityimpacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:H/A:N).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-21541` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openjdk-8-demo - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~18.04
openjdk-8-jdk - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~18.04
openjdk-8-jdk-headless - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~18.04
openjdk-8-jre - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~18.04
openjdk-8-jre-headless - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~18.04
openjdk-8-jre-zero - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~18.04
openjdk-8-source - 8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~18.04
No subscription required

openjdk-11-demo - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~18.04
openjdk-11-jdk - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~18.04
openjdk-11-jdk-headless - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~18.04
openjdk-11-jre - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~18.04
openjdk-11-jre-headless - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~18.04
openjdk-11-jre-zero - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~18.04
openjdk-11-source - 11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~18.04
No subscription required

openjdk-17-demo - 17.0.4+8-1~18.04
openjdk-17-jdk - 17.0.4+8-1~18.04
openjdk-17-jdk-headless - 17.0.4+8-1~18.04
openjdk-17-jre - 17.0.4+8-1~18.04
openjdk-17-jre-headless - 17.0.4+8-1~18.04
openjdk-17-jre-zero - 17.0.4+8-1~18.04
openjdk-17-source - 17.0.4+8-1~18.04
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openjdk-8 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8u342-b07-0ubuntu1~18.04').
icedtea-web package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
openjdk-lts package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.0.16+8-0ubuntu1~18.04').
openjdk-17 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '17.0.4+8-1~18.04').
